title.narrative: Implementation Plan 2013 for the Asia and Pacific Programme

description.narrative: ILO/Korea Partnership Programme: 2013 IMplementation Plan 1.1 Strengthened capacity of skills institutions in Asia region on cooperation, exchange of information and expertise with a view to improve skills development among all Member countries 2.1 Follow-through activity for Skills Standard developed for ICT 3.1 Skills for green jobs – meeting the national demands by developing tools that will help green national skilled force 4.1 Green entrepreneurship program (Indonesia) 5.1 Strengthened EI & EII as an important tool to reduce poverty and promote social & economic development in Asia and the Pacific region 6.1 Key OSH standards and safety culture adopted or promoted through international tranining 7.1 Sending and receiving countries within Asia with social partners continue to be supported with the latest development on RMCS and its growing significance especially in light of the free flow of skilled labour among ASEAN countries by 2015

transaction.ref: RAS/13/60/ROK-2013-LAO176 - Increased opportunities for decent livelihood and employment in rural economy-C
